summary: Revealing Steel Armor that uses CBBE
descriptionHtml:
I now have a Full Skimpy pack Page now you can find in  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654] Here [/url]



My first mod so be gentle. The mod contains a much more revealing Steel Armor. Pants removed and the plating on the legs are removed, along with the mid section showing some slight under boob ^^;

This mod also requires V0.1[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666] Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition [/url]

This mod has been updated to CBBE V0.2

The newer version i have uploaded added a mini skirt the the armor and some weight fixes, still far from perfect though. ><

Edit: I now have a skimpy forsworn armor type now [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3320] Link [/url]
author: KillerKeo
